column4: hey I am trying to open a network share (windows machine) through ubuntu and it shows the computer but when I double click it i get the error: The folder contents could not be displayed, Sorry, couldn't display all the contents of "Windows Network: desktop".
might be do to permissions on the windows machine, is it a windows 2000, xp machine?
make sure your ubuntu system is logged on with the same user, pass as the xp, vista machines
Is there a way to get around the same username password thing?
